Package control

Class HDBOfficerControl

java.lang.Object
control.HDBOfficerControl
public class HDBOfficerControl extends Object
Controls operations related to HDB Officers in the BTO system.

  • Constructor Summary

    HDBOfficerControl()

    • processOfficerRegistration

      public boolean processOfficerRegistration(entity.User user, entity.Project project, boolean approve)
      Process the registration of an officer candidate with file update This should replace the existing processOfficerRegistration method in HDBOfficerControl
      Parameters:
      user - the original user who registered
      project - the project
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Returns:
      true if processing was successful, false otherwise

      Check if a user is already an approved officer
      Parameters:
      nric - the user's NRIC
      Returns:
      true if already approved as an officer for any project, false otherwise
